blessings.description: Item. Take off. A random player on your Team scores 0.2 runs on each Stolen Base next season.
blessings.subheader: Brought to you by @An Airport for Aliens Currently Run by Dogs@http://patreon.com/strangescaffold
blessings.title: An Actual Airplane

blessings.description: Rub it in. Your Team is permanently Fireproof.
blessings.title: Doctor Smedley's Umpire Cream

blessings.description: Your Team is no longer allergic to Peanuts.
blessings.title: The Nut Button

blessings.description: Items. Your players are protected from Feedback.
blessings.title: Noise-Canceling Headphones

blessings.description: Birds will unshell your players much more often.
blessings.title: Bird Seed

blessings.description: Plug the leak. Your Team cannot have blood stolen in Blooddrain.
blessings.title: Sealant

blessings.description: 5 Hitters on your Team become permanently Repeating.
blessings.title: Rogue Waves

blessings.description: Oh Yes. Give your Team O No Blood type.
blessings.title: O-No Blood Type

blessings.description: Your Team plays 5% better during Away Games.
blessings.title: Traveling Team

blessings.description: Give Your Team and the last place Team in the opposite Sub-League the Fourth Strike next Season.
blessings.title: Tag-Team Fourth Strike

blessings.description: Take a stroll. Your Division Walks on Ball 3 next season.
blessings.title: Divisional Walk in the Park

blessings.description: Haunt a random player on your Team.
blessings.title: Haunted

blessings.description: Ban together. Improve your Divisionâ€™s Shadows overall by 3%.
blessings.title: Shadow Ban Together

blessings.description: Recruit the best pitcher from your Shadows to your Rotation.
blessings.title: Dark Star

blessings.description: Recruit the best hitter from your Shadows to your Lineup.
blessings.title: Hidden Power

blessings.description: OMG they noticed us. Steal a random player from the Idol Leaderboard.
blessings.title: Popular by Association

blessings.description: Swap your Team into the other Division in your Subleague.
blessings.title: Divisional Swap

blessings.description: Swap your Team into another Division in the opposite Subleague.
blessings.title: Subleague Swap

blessings.description: It's not stealing if we all do it. Improve your division by +10% hitting, -5% pitching.
blessings.title: Sharing Signs

blessings.description: Steal 3 random players from the Internet Series Champion.
blessings.title: People's Champions

decrees.description: If your Team scores 10+ Runs in a game, launch a Tactical Nuke.
decrees.title: Tactical Nuke

decrees.description: Every time a team hits a Home Run, there is a chance your Opponent loses a hitter for the remainder of the game.
decrees.title: Eliminator

decrees.description: When your Team is Shamed, initiate the Countdown.
decrees.title: Self-Destruct
